item.description: Indulge in the rich and creamy flavors of this homemade peppermint hot cocoa that rivals your favorite coffee shop. Perfectly sweetened and topped with whipped cream, it's a cozy treat for any occasion. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 10min | Serves: 4 | #1 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 25 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups milk
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1/2 cup cocoa powder
  • 1/2 cup sugar
  • 1 teaspoon peppermint extract
  • Whipped cream for topping
  • Crushed peppermint candies for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a saucepan, combine milk, heavy cream, cocoa powder, and sugar over medium heat.
  2. Whisk until the mixture is smooth and heated through, about 5 minutes.
  3. Remove from heat and stir in peppermint extract.
  4. Serve in mugs topped with whipped cream and crushed peppermint candies.

item.title: Pecan Pie Cheesecake Bars
item.description: Indulge in the perfect blend of creamy cheesecake and rich pecan pie with these delightful bars. They are a show-stopping dessert that will impress your guests and satisfy your sweet tooth. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 12 | #cat1761230294638 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 12

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup graham cracker crumbs
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 1 cup cream cheese, softened
  • 1/2 cup sugar
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 cup pecans, chopped
  • 1 cup corn syrup
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
  2. In a bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and melted butter, then press into the bottom of the prepared baking dish.
  3. In another bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth, then add eggs and vanilla, mixing until well combined.
  4. Spread the cream cheese mixture over the crust evenly.
  5. In a separate bowl, mix together chopped pecans, corn syrup, and brown sugar, then pour over the cheesecake layer.
  6. Bake for 30 minutes or until set, then let cool before slicing into bars.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 45 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 60 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 1/2 cups pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 3/4 cup brown sugar
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1 pre-made pie crust

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
  2. In a large bowl, whisk together pumpkin puree, heavy cream, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and salt until smooth.
  3. Pour the filling into the pie crust and smooth the top.
  4. Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce the temperature to 350°F (175°C) and bake for an additional 30 minutes, or until the filling is set.
  5. Let cool before serving.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 480 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 495 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 4 cups chicken broth
  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn)
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Place the chicken breasts in the slow cooker.
  2. Add chicken broth, mixed vegetables, onion, garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper.
  3. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours.
  4. Once cooked, shred the chicken with two forks and stir back into the soup.

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 20 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 30 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 24

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 1/2 cups granulated sugar
  • 1 egg
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
  3. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
  4. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract until well combined.
  5. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture, mixing until just combined.
  6. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to about 1/4 inch thick.
  7. Cut out shapes using cookie cutters and place them on a baking sheet.
  8. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until the edges are lightly golden.
  9. Let cool completely before decorating.

item.description: These delightful gingerbread men are not only fun to make but also a joy to decorate! Perfect for holiday gatherings, they bring a warm, spicy aroma to your kitchen and create lasting memories with family. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 10min | Serves: 24 | #cat1761230294638 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 25 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 24

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 3 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 tablespoon ground ginger
  • 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 cup brown sugar, packed
  • 1/2 cup molasses
  • 1 large egg
  • Royal icing for decoration
  • Assorted candies for decorating

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a bowl, whisk together flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
  2. In a separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar until fluffy.
  3. Beat in molasses and egg until well combined.
  4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until a dough forms.
  5. Chill the dough for at least 1 hour.
  6. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
  7. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to about 1/4 inch thick.
  8. Cut out gingerbread men shapes and place them on a baking sheet.
  9. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until edges are firm.
  10. Let cool completely before decorating with royal icing and candies.

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cubed
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, sauté the onion and garlic until translucent.

  4. Blend the soup until smooth, season with salt and pepper, and serve warm.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup red lentils
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon turmeric
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add onion, carrots, and celery; sauté for about 5 minutes until softened.
  3. Stir in garlic, cumin, and turmeric; cook for another minute until fragrant.
  4. Add red lentils and vegetable broth; bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are tender.
  6. Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 90 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 105 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup wild rice
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 medium onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cups butternut squash, diced
  • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1 teaspoon sage
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Rinse the wild rice under cold water and set aside.
  2. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  3. Add butternut squash and mushrooms, cooking for about 5 minutes until softened.
  4. Stir in the wild rice, vegetable broth, thyme, and sage. Bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 1 hour or until rice is tender.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 25 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 2 leeks, cleaned and sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat and add the sliced leeks. Sauté until soft, about 5 minutes.
  2. Add the diced potatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until potatoes are tender.
  3. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste.

⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound mushrooms, sliced
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onions and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and become tender.
  3. Pour in the vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
  4. Stir in the heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and blend until smooth.

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups fresh strawberries, hulled and sliced
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 3/4 cup milk

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
  3. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  4. Stir in milk until just combined.
  5. Turn dough onto a floured surface and knead gently.
  6. Roll out to 1-inch thickness and cut into rounds.
  7. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
  8. While the cakes bake, whip the heavy cream with sugar until soft peaks form.
  9. Once the cakes are cool, slice them in half, layer with strawberries and whipped cream, and serve.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 cups apples, peeled and sliced
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup all-purpose flour (or gluten-free flour)
  • 1/2 cup vegan butter or regular butter
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine sliced apples, cinnamon, and a bit of brown sugar. Toss to coat.
  3. In another bowl, mix oats, flour, brown sugar, and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  4. Spread the apple mixture in a baking dish and top with the oat mixture.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the apples are tender and the topping is golden brown.

⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 50 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 65 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 6 cups sliced apples
  • 1 cup brown sugar
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine sliced apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. Mix well.
  3. Transfer the apple mixture to a greased baking dish.
  4. In another bowl, mix rolled oats, flour, and melted butter until crumbly.
  5. Sprinkle the oat mixture evenly over the apples.
  6. Bake for 40-50 minutes until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, sugar, and vegetable oil until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the pumpkin mixture, stirring until just combined.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
  7. Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  8. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup raisins (optional)

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, vegetable oil, and sugar until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, spices, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Fold in raisins if using.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
  7. Bake for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
  8. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a pot, combine red lentils and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until lentils are soft, about 15 minutes.

  4. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
  5. Scoop tablespoon-sized portions of the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, shaping them into rolls.
  6. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the rolls are firm and slightly golden on the outside.

🍳 Cook Time: 0 minutes

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 package ginger snap cookies, crushed
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 8 ounces cream cheese, softened
  • 1 cup powdered sugar
  • 1 can (15 ounces) pumpkin puree
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1 cup heavy whipping cream
  • Additional cinnamon for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix crushed ginger snap cookies with melted butter until well combined.
  2. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9x13 inch dish to form the crust.
  3. In another bowl, beat the cream cheese and powdered sugar until smooth.
  4. Add the pumpkin puree, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon to the cream cheese mixture and mix until well blended.
  5. Spread the pumpkin mixture over the crust evenly.
  6. In a separate bowl, whip the heavy cream until stiff peaks form, then spread it over the pumpkin layer.
  7. Sprinkle additional cinnamon on top for garnish.
  8. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice
  • 1 pound smoked sausage, sliced
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  • 1/2 cup heavy cream
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  5. Dip each chicken roll in heavy cream and then coat with breadcrumbs.
  6. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sear the chicken rolls until golden brown on all sides.
  7. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes or until cooked through.
  8. Remove toothpicks before serving.

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  4. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant.
  5. Add the drained pasta and broccoli to the skillet, tossing to combine. If needed, add reserved pasta water to reach desired consistency.
  6. Season with salt and pepper, and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups rolled oats
  • 2 apples, diced
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 2 cups almond milk
  • 1/4 cup honey or maple syrup
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup chopped nuts (optional)

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine oats, diced apples, cinnamon, and salt.
  3. In another bowl, mix almond milk and honey or maple syrup.
  4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until well combined.
  5. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and sprinkle with chopped nuts if using.
  6. Bake for 30 minutes or until the top is golden and the oats are set.

⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pie crust
  • 6 large eggs
  • 1 cup milk
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 cup chopped vegetables (like spinach, bell peppers, or onions)
  • 1 cup cooked meat (like bacon, sausage, or ham)
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
  2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk until well combined.
  3. Stir in the cheese, vegetables, meat, salt, and pepper.
  4. Pour the egg mixture into the pie crust.
  5. Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the quiche is set and lightly golden on top.
  6. Allow to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
